verses.roman:
e saba siddhānta haya āmrera pallava
bhakta-gaṇa-kokilera sarvadā vallabha

synonyms: e—these; saba—all; siddhānta—transcendental conclusions; haya—are; āmrera—of mango; pallava—twigs; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; kokilera—to those who are just like cuckoo birds; sarvadā—always; vallabha—pleasing.
translation: All these conclusions are like the newly grown twigs of a mango tree; they are always pleasing to the devotees, who in this way resemble cuckoo birds.
